known_issues: White screen appears in the main section where "karm" is displayed (faulty terminal area).

existing_features.title: Investigate and fix the white/blank screen appearing in the main hero section where the "KARM" wordmark is displayed over the FaultyTerminal background, so the hero consistently renders with a dark background and the intended terminal effect across supported browsers/devices.

Add a graceful fallback for the FaultyTerminal component when WebGL context creation, shader compilation, or program linking fails, ensuring the hero section still displays a dark, visually coherent background instead of a white/blank screen.

projectName: Fix white/blank screen in hero section around KARM + FaultyTerminal background
